alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:53PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Broome, east central Tioga and southwestern Chenango Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nanticoke, or near Greater Binghamton Airport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nanticoke, Greene, Whitney Point, Lisle, Greater Binghamton Airport, Sanitaria Springs, Chenango Forks, Chenango Bridge, Castle Creek and Chenango Valley State Park. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 6 and 8. Interstate 88 between 2 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
